code: @Override public Node item(int index) {     return list.get(index). }

private void init(NodeList source) throws Exception {     for (int i = 0. i < source.getLength(). i++) {         Node node = source.item(i).         if (node != null) {             // so we need to synchronize on it             synchronized (node.getOwnerDocument()) {                 Document doc = new XmlConverter().createDocument().                 // so we need to synchronize on it                 synchronized (node.getOwnerDocument()) {                     Node clone = doc.importNode(node, true).                     if (clone instanceof Text) {                         // basic text node then add as-is                         list.add(clone).                     } else {                         // more complex node, then add as child (yes its a bit weird but this is working)                         doc.appendChild(clone).                         list.add(doc.getChildNodes().item(0)).                     }                 }             }         }     } }
